content.headline: Pope Francis lands to cheers in the US
content.info: Pope Francis arrived in the Washington, DC area from Cuba on Tuesday afternoon and was greeted by President Obama and his family when he got off the papal plane.

content.headline: Paraplegic man walks after spine "bypass"
content.info: A paraplegic man has been able to walk a short distance after scientists used a computer which read signals from his brain and then sent stimulus to his legs.
